text: Rich Whitney (born April 21, 1955) is an American politician and civil rights attorney. He was the Illinois Green Party's nominee for Governor of Illinois in the elections of 2006 and 2010. The Southwest News-Herald, Thursday, November 2, 2006 ==References== ==Other websites== *Whitney for Governor (Official Website) *Rich Whitney for Governor on MySpace *A look at Rich Whitney, Green Party candidate for governor *"Don't Fear the Spoiler: Why it's (probably) safe to vote Green for governor" (Chicago Reader, Oct. 2006) Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:People from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:People from Carbondale, Illinois
title: Rich Whitney
